import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import Card from '../components/Card' const Home = () => { const [film, setFilm] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getData = async () => { let { data } = await axios( "https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/now_playing?api_key=6d5956df35973740afd6850dee564abe&language=en-US" ); setFilm(data.results); }; getData(); }, []); console.log(film); return ( <>

); }; export default Home;
